name: Basic LLM Chain
semantic_context: A simple chain to prompt a large language model
natural_language_description: 这是 Basic LLM Chain 节点。主要用于: A simple chain to prompt a large language model

notice.displayName: Connect an output parser on the canvas to specify the output format you require
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connect an output parser on the canvas to specify the output format you require

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Prompt | 默认值: ={{ $json.chatInput }} | (必填项)

promptType.name: promptType
promptType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source for Prompt (User Message) | 默认值: auto
available_options: Connected Chat Trigger Node (值: auto) - Looks for an input field called 'chatInput' that is coming from a directly connected Chat Trigger
Connected Guardrails Node (值: guardrails) - Looks for an input field called 'guardrailsInput' that is coming from a directly connected Guardrails Node
Define below (值: define) - Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Prompt (User Message) | (必填项)

hasOutputParser.name: hasOutputParser
hasOutputParser.natural_language_description: 参数名: Require Specific Output Format | 默认值: False

needsFallback.name: needsFallback
needsFallback.natural_language_description: 参数名: Enable Fallback Model | 默认值: False

messages.displayName: Chat Messages (if Using a Chat Model)
messages.name: messages
messages.natural_language_description: 参数名: Chat Messages (if Using a Chat Model) | 默认值: {}

batching.name: batching
batching.description: Batch processing options for rate limiting
batching.natural_language_description: 参数名: Batch Processing | 作用: Batch processing options for rate limiting | 默认值: {}
available_options: batchSize (值: None) - How many items to process in parallel. This is useful for rate limiting, but might impact the log output ordering.
delayBetweenBatches (值: None) - Delay in milliseconds between batches. This is useful for rate limiting.

fallbackNotice.displayName: Connect an additional language model on the canvas to use it as a fallback if the main model fails
fallbackNotice.name: fallbackNotice
fallbackNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connect an additional language model on the canvas to use it as a fallback if the main model fails
